Collection.description: Document representing a iDAI.world collection record (https://collections.idai.world). core_fields.type is 'collection'

BibliographicRecord.description: Document representing a iDAI.world bibliographic record (https://zenon.dainst.org). core_fields.type is 'biblio'

Concept.description: Document representing a iDAI.world concept (https://thesauri.dainst.org). core_fields.type is 'concept'. May be linked to other documents via 'general_topics'

Place.description: Document representing a iDAI.world place (https://gazetteer.dainst.org). core_fields.type is 'place'. May be linked to other documents via 'spatial_topics'

geometry.description: List of GeoJSON geometries associated with the place

TemporalConcept.description: Document representing a iDAI.world chronologic/period record (https://chronontology.dainst.org). core_fields.type is 'temporal_concept', . May be linked to other documents via 'temporal_topics'

beginning.description: Starting year for the record, negative values are BCE.

ending.description: Ending year for the record, negative values are BCE.

full_record.description: JSON representation of the original dataset harvested from the document's source system.

Geometry.description: A geometry as defined by the GeoJSON standard
